document.full_text: ivory coast's rti state television controlled by laurent gbagbo resumed broadcasting on friday after it was closed for almost a day by heavy fighting, a reuters witness said.
document.title: pro-gbagbo ivorian television resumes broadcasting
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's rti state television controlled by laurent gbagbo resumed broadcasting on friday after it was closed for almost a day by heavy fighting, a reuters witness said.
